https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2BvtvDUyxiMJ4dmKfiQf4qdOHQN.jpg The film tells a story of a divorced couple trying to raise their young son. The story follows the boy for twelve years, from first grade at age 6 through 12th grade at age 17-18, and examines his relationship with his parents as he grows. Boyhood
